https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null Three guys decide to spend a few days at a club where they find nothing but beautiful girls, since one of them has just got married. As soon as they get there, they decide to spice up their: the men make a $2000 bet for the person who achieves the most goals, which consist of having sex with women in jacuzzi tubs, having sex with two women at once, and more.
